Saint St St. Louis Cristal Crystal Cobalt Blue Ash Tray 1 Sold For: or Sign In to see what it's worth. Sold Date: 08/24/2008 Channel: Online Auction Source: eBay Category: Glass
You are bidding on a Rare, Saint Louis Cristal Cobalt Blue and Clear Ash Tray. Weighs Near 5 lbs -----7"5/8 diameter --- 2" high It is Beautiful Cobalt Blue and Clear Crystal with the Acid Etched emblem on the bottom , and the trademark sticker on the side.. It is in overall âeoe Near mint condition âeoe
